duties_responsibilities.duty: Applies knowledge of mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic and electrical controls, and PLC programming to support projects for the repair, upgrade or replacement of facility equipment and controls.
Provides technical support to manufacturing colleagues and customers.
Designs experiments and tests protocols for customer, facility and sales requirements.
Manages Technical Service Requests (TSRs) in support of business needs and innovation projects.
Stays current of industry trends for equipment controls and implements best practices.
May lead the work of small project teams and provide informal guidance to less experienced engineering colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (or equivalent) and 4-8 years of experience.
